abstract: Naik Muhammad, Abdul Wahab and Adnan Arshad, men accused of 2009 attack on Sri Lankan cricket team, and a fourth man, Ateequr Rehman, who is said to have joined the three in bombing and assault of Lahore's Moon Market that same year, are killed in militant ambush while in Pakistani police custody; it is unclear why men were outside prison where they stay awaiting trial, although some reports say they were attempting to escape.

headline.print_headline: 3 Suspects in 2009 Attack on Cricket Team Are Killed
headline.main: 3 Suspects in 2009 Attack on Sri Lankan Cricket Team Are Killed in Pakistan

snippet: The police said the men, and a fourth militant, had died in a shootout when another group of militants tried to free them from custody....
lead_paragraph: The police said the men, and a fourth militant, had died in a shootout when another group of militants tried to free them from custody.
